title: Philanthropic Initiatives of RIL
description: Founded in 2010 by Nita M Ambani, Reliance Foundation has made a difference in the lives of 5.75+ crore people across India. Ril Foundation has also established strategic partnerships with organizations such as the Indian Olympic Association for Olympics, the Commonwealth and Asian Games, the Athletics Federation of India and the United States Agency for International Development for the Women Connect Challenge.
keywords: Nita M Ambani, Reliance Foundation, RIL

og:description: Reliance Industries Limited is committed to innovation-led, exponential growth in the areas of hydrocarbon exploration and production, petroleum refining and marketing, petrochemicals, retail and telecommunications.
